about.title: Meet the Team
about.description: Effuse is powered by a community of dedicated developers committed to building the future of reactive web applications. Meet some of the contributors shaping the ecosystem below.

sections.title: Core Team Members
sections.description: The core team is responsible for the ongoing development and stewardship of the Effuse framework. These individuals lead the architecture, maintenance, and long-term vision of our core libraries.

about.name: Chris M. Pérez

meta.title: About Me - Effuse
meta.description: Meet the team behind the Effuse framework.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
notFound.track: Let's get you back on track.

meta.title: 404 - Page Not Found | Effuse
meta.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

form.title: Form Management
form.description: Demonstrating reactive form handling with useForm and useMutation hooks
form.noPosts: No posts created yet. Submit the form above to get started.

todos.title: Todos with Query + Portal
todos.noTodos: No todos yet. Add one above!

props.title: Props Reactivity Demo
props.description: Modify the parent state below to see child components update in real-time. Some child components also have buttons to trigger updates from the child up to the parent.

i18n.title: Internationalization Demo
i18n.description: This page demonstrates the @effuse/i18n package with reactive locale switching.
i18n.summary: Hi {{name}}, you are building {{project}} v{{version}} — an amazing journey into modern i18n!

emit.title: Emit
emit.description: Event emitter with reactive signal support

context.title: Context API
context.description: Powerful dependency injection for sharing state across components without prop drilling.
context.themeSwitcherDesc: Click buttons to cycle through themes. All cards receive the theme via props (reactive signal).
context.nestedProviderDesc: Inner providers override outer ones. Each level can have its own theme.

controlFlow.title: Control Flow Components
controlFlow.description: Powerful components for conditional and list rendering

show.title: Show Component
show.description: Conditional rendering based on signal truthiness

switch.title: Switch / Match Pattern
switch.description: Mutually exclusive conditional rendering using Show

for.title: For Component
for.description: Reactive list rendering with keyed reconciliation

dynamic.title: Dynamic Styling
dynamic.description: Reactive styles and classes with signals

repeat.title: Repeat Component
repeat.description: Render content N times with index access and fallback support

await.title: Await Component
await.description: Declarative async rendering with pending, error, and success states

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Effuse framework, documentation, and related services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement.

license.title: 2. License
license.content: Effuse is released under the MIT License. You are free to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, subject to the conditions of the MIT License.

usage.title: 3. Use of the Framework
usage.content: You agree to use Effuse only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe upon the rights of others.
list: You may use Effuse for personal and commercial projects
You must include the original copyright notice in any copies
You may not use the Effuse name to endorse products without permission

disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The software is provided "as is", without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and noninfringement.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall the authors or copyright holders be liable for any claim, damages, or other liability, whether in an action of contract, tort, or otherwise, arising from, out of, or in connection with the software or the use or other dealings in the software.

changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
changes.content: These terms may be modified at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please

meta.title: Terms of Service - Effuse
meta.description: Terms of Service for using the Effuse framework and related services.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: This is a documentation website for the Effuse framework. Its sole purpose is to provide information and examples to developers.

collection.title: 2. Data Collection
collection.content: I do not collect any personal information from visitors. You can browse the documentation freely without providing any data.

cookies.title: 3. Cookies
cookies.content: This website does not use cookies or any local storage tracking mechanisms.

services.title: 4. Third-Party Services
services.content: The documentation and examples are hosted statically. No third-party analytics or tracking services are used.

contact.title: 5. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions, you can reach me at

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Effuse
meta.description: Privacy Policy for the Effuse framework - documentation website.

experimental.title: Experimental Nature
experimental.content: Effuse is an experimental UI framework created primarily for educational purposes and to explore new approaches to reactivity and component architecture.

competitor.title: Not a Competitor
competitor.content1: This framework is not intended to compete with or replace established, production-grade solutions like React, Vue, Angular, Svelte, or SolidJS.
competitor.content2: While Effuse demonstrates modern reactive concepts, the major frameworks offer mature ecosystems, extensive tooling, and battle-tested stability that Effuse does not aim to replicate.

risk.title: Use at Your Own Risk
risk.content: Please use this framework with the understanding that it is experimental. APIs may change, and it may not be suitable for critical production applications.

meta.title: Disclaimer - Effuse
meta.description: Disclaimer regarding the experimental nature of the Effuse framework.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: You can reach out to me directly via email:

meta.title: Contact - Effuse
